QuestData.Title: My Time Has Passed
QuestData.Description: <Weakly, Furien beckons you near and struggles to speak.>$b$bCareless... I was shot down by Alliance fire...$b$bYou must... inform my sister.$b$bTake my mount, $r... he'll bring you to her...$b$b<Furien expires.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Furien at Tethris Aran wants you to ride his Dragonhawk to Furien's Post and inform his sister, Cerelia of his death.
QuestData.RewardText: What!?$b$bFurien!! My brother is no more?$b$bThey must pay! All of them!
